transcript:
smiling shyly in his uncomfortable position, evidently wishing to adopt a jocular tone. But before he had fin- ished he felt that his jest was unacceptable and had not come off. He grew confused. 
"Kindly return to your posts," said the staff officer trying to preserve his gravity. 
Prince Andrew glanced again at the artillery officer's small figure. There was something pe- culiar about it, quite unsoldierly, rather comic, but extremely attractive.
